lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to expand their business and provde for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a major university in the United States.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: For whom much is given, much is expected.

lenders.name: Arnab
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: gabriella
lenders.loan_because: I believe I must help others less lucky than me

lenders.name: Andrea and Family
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that culture's dialog and interaction are the sole weapon for peacekeeping.
All our children should aim for an equal world based on EQUAL lifestile opportunity.
Everibody should demonstrate that often common people's points of view, are not in accordance with governement's administrators, who usually have better choices.
TAKE YOUR CHANCE AND LOAN A DREAM!

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I have visited developing countries and enjoy Kiva as a way to help entrepreneurs get a start. A great idea.
lenders.occupational_info:
Doing the best I can with what I have to work with. 
Website is my day job.

lenders.name: Nicolas
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the normal way the world should fonctionate: if someone needs something I have and if I don\'t need it at the same time, I lend it.
lenders.occupational_info:
Actually I work in a small company dealing with catchment areas management, agronomy, soil science, erosion and ecological problems.
We could be part of team to realize some projects (landscape, urbanization...) or doing impact studies. In this case one part of the job is making diagnosis, the other proposals. 
Nice to learn many things.

But if you prefer to speak about beekeeping or to speak german I'm here!!

lenders.name: Neil and family
lenders.occupational_info: I am designing and starting to build a 5 seat electric car that should have a range of at least 300-400 miles.

lenders.name: Annette
lenders.loan_because: poor people deserve a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: haitifriends.com

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I have a lot of respect for the courage it takes to start and/or run a small business.
lenders.occupational_info: Buying IT equipment

lenders.name: Jeremiah and Brooke
lenders.loan_because: God desires it.

lenders.name: carlisles
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it makes us feel good to participate in the world in a positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband writes programs for computers and I make and teach sculpture.

lenders.name: Kd
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: puoti.fi
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and I believe lending to businesses in developing countries is more motivating for the receiver than direct aid.
lenders.occupational_info: IT-professional / online retail. We sell lots of fair trade t-shirts at BoutikBoutik.com & Puoti.fi

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: Like to see this work for people who want to help themselves

lenders.name: patrick
lenders.loan_because: To those that much has been given, much is expected

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: it's such a good investment.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: i want to give back to society in a way that helps future generations have the same opportunities i had growing up.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm a researcher at a real estate investment management firm.  i'm interested in the built environment and how it shapes community development.

lenders.name: Bruce & Mary Kay
lenders.occupation: We are both retired after raising 9 children.
lenders.loan_because: We have a substantial life of retirement. We have always helped those whose need is greater than ours.  Power is not in our hands, only small gifts. Micro lending is a gift that can be given over and over.
lenders.occupational_info: My retired life has been and is spent in the finding of my family. Where did we come from? Who were these people that came from a country where indenture was a way of life?

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: As a Christian I have found that God is growing a passion within me to partner with initiatives like Kiva.  I believe that the alleviation of poverty through wealth redistribution should be a priority for every follower of Christ.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor who works primarily with students and young adults.  I'm passionate about learning what it means to follow the teachings and example of Jesus, and help others participate in that journey.

lenders.name: Liza
lenders.loan_because: I've travelled to a lot of these places and I realize how lucky I've been. Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time in the advertising department at a local newspaper.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: Why not?  It's a great way to spread wealth to where it's needed.  It's fun.  It's rewarding.  It's a good thing to do.  It's interesting.

lenders.name: dminmem
lenders.occupational_info: I create and design advertising for print, broadcast and web.

lenders.name: Meghan and Chad
lenders.loan_because: Instead of making a purchase for Christmas each year for my parents, I give a loan in their name.  They have so little need compared to many in the world, and will appreciate seeing my money going to a project such as this instead.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend UW graduate school for Public Health Nutrition, and plan to work in dietetics and health policy.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: Micro is better! :)
lenders.occupational_info: I develop databases and applications running on web sites. I love astronomy and  trekking.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: The loan is in my grandchildren\'s--Dalton, Jacob, David, and Claire-- interest to focus attention on others\' needs and so that they may observe the effect of micro lending for an individual building a business.

lenders.name: Ryan and Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: sometimes the first obstacle is the biggest.
lenders.occupational_info: she is in school and he runs a small business, and they are both just trying to do good.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy watching people start and succeed at running their own company.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide Broadband and IT Solutions to Businesses.

lenders.name: Boxer
lenders.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lenders.name: Lori & Andy
lenders.loan_because: A lot of people have done a lot for us and we believe in retuning the favor.  Although we\'re critical of many microcredit and microfinance programs, we wanted to give Kiva a try because it links people in a much more personal way.
lenders.occupational_info: (About us)  Lori is currently in graduate school earning two masters degrees.  She was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Africa and a teacher in Asia, and continues to do public health work internationally.  Andy is a manager of a major book store.

lenders.name: zach
lenders.occupational_info: I print magazines, and play music in a rock band.

lenders.name: Katya
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to give back in a productive way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: It is putting assets directly into the hands of the people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves investing money for clients.  My life involves my husband and three sons, extended family, traveling, writing, my sport, and cooking.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Gaylan
lenders.loan_because: All the people of the world should have an opportunity to invest in their own future, and have the dignity of providing for themselves and their families. Microfinancing encourages the business owner by empowering them to seize such opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: As a seminary professor, I help to prepare workers for the church of Jesus Christ by equipping them in knowledge of the Bible, of themselves, and of the world around them.

lenders.name: LyAnna
lenders.loan_because: "For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required."

lenders.name: Connie O.
lenders.loan_because: I really believe in the idea that microlenders can help people improve their situations in places where banks just will not take a chance, especially when you see  the success rate of all these businesses that allows almost all of them to pay back the investments in full. It is an amazing success story.
lenders.occupational_info: Hardware design, specifically use of programs (simulators) to check whether hardware would work right even before it was built, automated regression, compiler build/qualification.

lenders.name: Ben, Beth and Mikayla
lenders.loan_because: Our giving is renewable this way.  Instead of just giving money, each time we give money and get it back we can re-lend it.
lenders.occupational_info: The Kickert's live in Swaziland Africa working with Cabrini Ministries (www.cabriniministries.org).  Their work centers around Health Care for those dealing with HIV/TB as well as Child Care for orphans and vulnerable children.

lenders.name: Brian and Candy
lenders.loan_because: We've been to some areas of the world like this and it's absolutely remarkable how far a few bucks will go.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: My family emigrated to America from Lithuania prior to World War II.  They received a lot of help from the community, and managed to have good lives.  I\'d like to repay the kindness shown to my family by giving a helping hand to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own business providing accounting services to new companies.  I really enjoy working with entrepeneurs and helping them to create a strong foundation for managing their businesses.

lenders.name: Desira
lenders.loan_because: Void

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: I own a small business and I know how a little bit of help can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help parents listen to each other about what their children need.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I feel that Kiva gives more of the money I loan directly to the people who need it. If everyone in richer countries loaned small amounts to people in poorer countries no one would be poor anymore.
lenders.occupational_info: I have to drive my small car for 30 minutes every morning to get to my office in a Canadian Government building.

lenders.name: Kzinti
lenders.loan_because: We are becoming one world community. It was through hard work and the kindness of many people that I have achieved what I have. Now it is my turn to be able to help others achieve their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and robots in a manufacturing facility.

lenders.name: Girls Incorporated
lenders.loan_because: We are an edcucation and advocacy group for girls 5 to 18 years old of all economic background.  We are using Kiva in cooperation with our Economic Literacy program.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.occupation: Co-owner of Lunaroma, and Software Programmer
lenders.loan_because: Small businesses are the most important things to develop and support in our economy today. They support communities, and help people to create their own prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I run an aromatherapy business that hand-crafts hundreds of bath and body care products, perfumes and much more. We use only 100% natural ingredients, mostly organic and/or wild-crafted

lenders.name: AburukuwaA
lenders.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lenders.name: edward
lenders.loan_because: I have been given the chance to help others and I want to live up to the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a group of Christians as their pastor.  I teach the bible, share life with them, and we try to make a difference in the lives of those around.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help making poverty history. I guess i'm a bit of an idealist there.
lenders.occupational_info: When our customers and their computers don't want to co-operate, i help, or i find somebody who does. It's a constant exploration between people, the work they do and the technology they (must) use to do it.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to assist people who are willing to work to improve their economic situation.
lenders.occupational_info: Insurance Sales

lenders.name: Tom & Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs help sometime (and we got help when we needed it)

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping women entrepreneurs who need a little help to achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make a difference to their own lives and the lives of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment, I'm studying constitutional law. I am interested in the way legal structures make a difference to people's lives. But sometimes abstract legal concepts feel very far removed from the reality of everyday experience, which is where Kiva operates. I think it's helpful to be reminded of life outside ivory towers on a regular basis.

lenders.name: ateeq
lenders.loan_because: i am
lenders.occupational_info: i am a socialist focused on investing in women who can make a living in a capitalist world to improve their quality of life.

lenders.name: Stratocaster
lenders.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lenders.name: Peter Schiess
lenders.loan_because: The pudu made me do it.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a youth organization that provides after-school programs to 300 students.

lenders.name: Pumpkin
lenders.loan_because: The gift has been given, in His name we are to share.\r\nGod Bless Us Everyone\r\n

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have the opportunity to make things better for themselves and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching children how to read, write, and succeed in the classroom.

lenders.name: Dabney
lenders.loan_because: to whom much is given much is required

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I too went through hard times.  The kindness of strangers helped restore my faith in myself and the belief that we are all meant to work for the common good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit serving the elderly poor.  My job is to wade through the government and insurance red tape to collect money for the services we provide. Sounds like fun huh?

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I believe it helps them become self sustaining.  It teaches them to not only learn to fish, but how to own the pond.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an automobile dealership.  I help do anything the business needs, from financing, to selling, to working on cars, etc.

lenders.name: donna
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from being a horse doctor for 20 years; now raising two young sons

lenders.name: Conner
lenders.loan_because: i like the idea of helping people who are less fortunate than me and this is such an easy way to do it.  a little goes a long way to these people and if my loan helps thats cool with me
lenders.occupational_info: im an 8th grade student and i work on school stuff and i love to ski

lenders.name: Ethan & Leah
lenders.loan_because: trees grow from seeds and because we can
lenders.occupational_info: Manage construction projects

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: My team builds computer software that puts music and video on computers and mobile phones. My role is to make it easier for everyone else on the team to do their best work.

lenders.name: Cheryl and Ken
lenders.loan_because:
It is one of the most beautiful compensations of this life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself. . . .
Ralph Waldo Emerson -

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I have always worked in schools, at first teaching English and Social Studies and then as a school principal.

lenders.name: Semyon
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I help small companies get off the ground

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I admire the applicants entrepreneurial spirit!

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: Karma.

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: when the poorest is raised we are all raised.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: for $25 I can help save the world.

lenders.name: ross
lenders.loan_because: it offers the very highest of returns.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses learn that if they are mindful of electricity they will be more successful

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a handout does not profit the receiver that much.  Granting them a loan that must be repaid, so they can work hard at growing their own business and supporting themselves is giving these people the tools to help themselves.  Ultimately, that makes a stronger, more productive contributor to society.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time student, studying to become an accountant.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to keep a gift alive for a very long time.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to express some energy shared by all of us through my medium, paint. I hope to be connected to this energy enough to have it relate to those who see the results.

lenders.name: Sabrina
lenders.occupation: speaker, writer, coach and health care researcher
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who work hard to help themselves. Reaching around the world to support them feels wonderful.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a speaker, writer and coach at heart.  I love helping individuals and communities explore and embrace positive change.  Originally, I trained as a medical anthropologist. I'm keenly interested in health care reform, especially its impact on primary care and the urban "safety net".  My book, "Surviving HIV/AIDS in the Inner City: How Resourceful Latinas Beat the Odds," was published by the Rutgers University Press in February 2011.

lenders.name: Hernan
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use a little help and support.
lenders.occupational_info: Automotive supplier

lenders.name: Sergio
lenders.loan_because: this is real lending and makes a quantifiable difference!
lenders.occupational_info: i normally lend to borrowers who don't need the money as much!

lenders.name: James & Dian
lenders.loan_because: We want to see others get the chances we got.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell imprinted products to large companies

lenders.name: Canada's Coolest Class
lenders.loan_because: we care.
lenders.occupational_info: Education

lenders.name: Dan, Theresa & Catie
lenders.loan_because: We want to help improve the lives of families all over the world.  Children deserve a home, food and a chance to go to school.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a family business making metal parts for autos, airplanes, and many other products.  Our business was started because our parents came from Argentina and got a loan to go into business.  This is our way of helping others do the same.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Every dollar we spend is a vote....overall, I believe how we spend our money is more important than the levers we pull every four years.......
lenders.occupational_info: I work for state legislatures and others on education(school) distribution formulas and revenue structures....

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the chance to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I wire houses so people can have heat, lights and other electrical items.

lenders.name: Raven
lenders.loan_because: The spirits tell me to. They decide who gets it and who doesn\'t. I don\'t know why it\'s \"this one\" and not \"that one\", but I go along with it. I don\'t have very much money, but I can afford $25 once in a while.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a shaman, and I do readings and spirit-work for clients. I also work a small farm with my wife - we have goats, sheep, poultry, and rabbits.

lenders.name: Cheralynn
lenders.loan_because: Kiva was a Christmas gift given to me by a friend.  I love that I was given the gift to give!  I am looking forward to seeing the journey this leads me on.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school art.

lenders.name: Thi
lenders.loan_because: I give a drop and it could be an ocean for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an ESL teacher, and part of my work is to interact with many people from various social, economical and cultural backgrounds. Sometimes it feels like having a small united cosmos reaching out to me. In my work, I take journeys here and there without going anywhere far, and I can't ask for  more.

lenders.name: Kira
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I have seen the power of microfinancing throughout our travels. We also realize how fortunate we are. We are blessed with good health, good jobs and a loving family. We\'d like to share some of this good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: small entrepreneurs are what make up the fabric of a healthy, free society.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled throughout Southeast Asia and Central America, and have seen first-hand people trying their best to use their entrepreneurial skills to help their families better their circumstances. So it gives me a real feeling of connection to see their photos and read their stories as I try to give them a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary math curriculum specialist, recently retired from a non-profit in Oregon. I continue to work as an independent contractor for them, though I am primarily retired.  I was a primary grades classroom teacher for 33 years prior to this job in all types of schools in the midwest, Japan, and the west coast of the US.

lenders.name: LaRaia Family
lenders.loan_because: Supporting others is the cornerstone of humanity.

lenders.name: Gary and Lori Gregory
lenders.occupational_info: I design and write software that allows businesses to communicate.

lenders.name: Mike and Diana
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the right thing to do. When you think that a small investment or several small investments, when repaid, can then be recycled to help others  in a continuum...well, that\'s as good as it gets. It\'s a rate of return with  meaning way beyond numbers.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: the best way to make the world a better place is to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Linda and Mark
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed with love, family and health, it's the least we can do! Trying to help the world one person at a time.

lenders.name: Jeni Yang
lenders.loan_because: we're all kind of in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with businesses to tackle issues and help them realize answers to questions  that they didn't know they could already answer.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Just a small amount of money can make a huge difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling engineering software.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: believe in microfinancing and more then that because I believe in people.  I want to see the US (and the world) walk out of their isolationist tendencies.  The people I\'ve met and the places I\'ve seen (Due to couchsurfing.com and my own will) make me believe in reducing poverty one small step at a time, and by enabling and not dictating.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computers work for a small quaker lobby organization in Washington DC.

lenders.name: Jarrett
lenders.loan_because: We have a responsibility to extend our priviledge and opportunity across humanity. For further information, I recommend reading John Rawls\' \"A Theory of Justice\".

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because:
An idea that is developed and put into action is more important than an idea that exists only as an idea. 
Buddha
lenders.occupational_info: I strive for spiritual progress rather then spiritual perfection

lenders.name: Damian
lenders.loan_because: It's great to able to contribute and see where your money is going. The Frontline piece several years inspired me to start loaning to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage higher education enrollment, recruitment and admissions processes.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: knowing I can help people improve their lives for themselves, their family, and their community. That's what being a citizen of the world is all about.
lenders.occupational_info: I start nursing school in fall of 2011. I hope to become a neonatal or pediatric nurse.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: You must be the change you wish to see in the world. — Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of a small start to a large enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage technologies and create computer systems for cancer research.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: b/c I have more money than I absolutely need, and other people don't.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the remote countryside, growing organic crops.  And I work doing various construction and landscaping jobs for folks in my area.

lenders.name: Milford High School
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is caring
lenders.occupational_info: We learn about Nobel Peace laureates and try to become agents of change for a better world because we are inspired by those peaceful heroes.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: They need it and I have more than enough. Why not share?
lenders.occupational_info: Service to others.

lenders.name: debbie & ralph
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I can and I would like to help.  It's nice to know one person can help make someone else's life better in a very simple manner.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business now, just launching it in fact.  It's nice to know I am helping other business people expand their enterprise.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: it is so much fun to loan directly to women across the world from me. I don\'t have much money, but I can lend $25 at a time. Thank you Kiva, for helping me be able to make a small but meaningful contribution to the well being of another family. I am grateful.

lenders.name: Athena
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a leg up at some point.  Helping others achieve their goals, dreams makes the world a better place for everyone.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to help at such a grass roots level. It feels so personal.

lenders.name: Sidney
lenders.loan_because: I'm a very lucky, happy girl and I want other people around the world to be happy too.  My parents want me to learn about helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm 9 years old and I love all the people of the world.

lenders.name: Gonzo
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending is going to change the world.

lenders.name: Rachael & Loren
lenders.loan_because: it's tzedakah.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the public find what they need for research, particularly on state history.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: it is the key to selfsufficiency for many disadvantaged people.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in landscape maintenance, gardening, and growing plants to sell for most of my working life. It is also my hobby.

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I am in a very lucky position.
lenders.occupational_info: I design/install subsea pipelines.  At the moment I am working for a large oil and gas company.  I have worked for many comanpies over the years ranging from people who build to people who design. Supposedly what I do is very specialised but a lot of it is common sense.  Oil companys pay millions/billions of dollars to lay piplines under the sea so they want the right people to look after that investment.  I am one of those people that looks after it from a technical point of view ie can we do this I would say yes/maybe or no.

lenders.name: monts
lenders.loan_because: i want to see the world change--if only a small portion at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: pastor of a church in san francisco - http://ikonsf.com

lenders.name: Nicolas Perot
lenders.occupational_info: I raise and invest money for the development of my company, the French postal company.

lenders.name: Sophie
lenders.loan_because: Although I am only 26 months old,I would love to make the world a better place someday.  I think everyone should have a chance to use their talents and be able to feel good about what they do.  Kiva allows me and my parents to make a difference in people\'s lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Toddler: Help my mom clean, draw scribbles with my crayons, help feed my cat Naomi, and generally make life wonderful for my parents Karine and Gavin

lenders.name: Sebastien
lenders.loan_because: I am glad I can help entrepreneurs who are working hard to better their life and their family\'s.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Jessie
lenders.loan_because: Reading the stories and seeing the pictures of the potential business owners makes me realize anything is possible if we only get out of bed in the morning...take a deep breath...and GO FOR IT!  We all need to love and support each other in these positive endeavors.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small architectural firm in the United States. I deal with a variety of personality types, and have a fairly creative position, which I really enjoy.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that a little extra from me can make a big difference to a person half way around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: graphic design and art

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because: I think it may really help. I have some money \"in excess\" in present time, and I want not to waste it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a military medic of the Carabinieri. Carabinieri is sort of police in Italy, but military. Very tipical of Italy.

lenders.name: Philip & Jess
lenders.loan_because: The idea that a few dollars can change lives is a powerful one.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide assistance to owners of rental housing for low income families and my wife teaches music.

lenders.name: Doug & Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's fun, it's needed
lenders.occupational_info: Doug is the new drummer for a local country-rock band called The Ramblin Jaks.  Susan writes songs and (to be continued)...

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a far more direct way of helping people help themselves.  I select projects that appear to be sustainable, and avoid those that may have harmful environmental impacts.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I am a teacher, trying to help people understand environmental and conservation issues, and to feel more empowered to be involved at home and abroad.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It is a way to make the world a happier place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students about Human Sexuality.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I live in a wealthy country and although I am not wealthy I am very fortunate.  Passing that on to someone else seems like a very responsible thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I would tell them that I work for an engineering firm.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to achieve their dreams and provide for themselves, their families, and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney representing public sector labor unions.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: i am extremely lucky to be living in a great country like Canada and want to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Dave, Lillie & Kids
lenders.loan_because: it works!

lenders.name: Lizzie
lenders.loan_because: it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a freelance writer and curator, and the author Detour: My Bipolar Road Trip in 4-D.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: I want to express my values in a clearly tangible way
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching the power of the precise use of English language, which in turns aids individuals to be economically self-sufficient and morally munificent.

lenders.name: John Stephanie Nona
lenders.loan_because: we can help the world be a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: We help businesses get their message out to their audience through creative solutions in design, print and web media.

lenders.name: Marli
lenders.loan_because: Others have helped me and I'm paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people gain more confidence in their ability to manage their money.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with opportunity as a \"birth rite\" while others have to fight, live in mind-numbing poverty, even go hungry on a daily basis.  To these poeple, \"opportunity\" is more of a fantasy than it is a part of their everyday lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with computers and software for many years but I have traded them for a camera.  I attempt to make images that bring a new perspective to the way we \"see\".

lenders.name: Carmen & Scout
lenders.loan_because: I know first hand the challenges of trying to start a business. Along with having a passion for what you do and the energy to support it, we all need a financial foundation. I absolutely love being able to help someone realize their dream.
lenders.occupational_info:
In my profession, I gather information on people and companies that my customers are interested in doing business with or investing in. I try to determine whether the subjects I am researching are reputable, honest, and trustworthy. If they are not, my customer will likely do business with someone else. I am an investigator, also known as a detective.

I started my own business in March of this year (2007). I have had many struggles and it takes a LOT of hard work! But...it is sooooo worth it!

When I am not working, I am spending time with family, friends, and my dog "Scout." I love to play in the dirt and dream of having a nice garden some day, and maybe a chicken, a goat, and a cow. :-) 

Peace. Love. Hugs.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: If it really is true that we are all one then, shoot, there is a lot of me that could use a loan somewhere! Loaning with the possibility of getting the money back allows me to increase my charitable giving above and beyond donations.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the tools they need to better themselves, hoping that they will oneday give someone the same opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Masters Student of Landscape Architecture.  When I am done with my schooling, I will design outdoor spaces, gardens, public spaces, parks, maybe even cities.

lenders.name: Mark & Dianne
lenders.loan_because: We have so much in this country. The small amount we give in conjunction with other Kiva lenders actually gives us a chance to make a difference in a life.  Thanks Kiva for giving us this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: We own and operate a family farm where Mark raises corn, soybeans and calves. Dianne teaches at a nearby university and does research at a private medical clinic.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: My friend Christina pointed this site out to me after her trip to India. I'm always interested in new ways to help people, and I've heard a lot about microcredit recently. I LOVE the idea of helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a nursing home that also has short term rehab facilities. I do the admission paperwork for all new residents & assist them & their families with whatever they need during their stay.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled the developing world from Indonesia to Haiti to several countries in Africa, including Madagascar, and I have seen the desperate need for agricultural assistance and healthcare in all of them. I want to help in any small way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent much of my career writing and producing films and videos that we shot in the developing world. These semi-documentaries feature advances in agricultural biotechnology and healthcare that have had major benefits for both people and the environment, worldwide.

lenders.name: Nadia
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying journalism so I can help people\'s stories reach one another.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to help because I have been helped!

lenders.name: Bruce, Miya & Taiyo
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I make web sites for non-profits organizations

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing continues to prove itself as an effective and efficient investment for world development. It is helping many people gain access to capital and enjoy the possibility to create a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy being creative and imaginative. I see myself as an entrepreneur using business concepts as a form of art to challenge peoples' concept of capitalism and provoke challenging discussions.

lenders.name: Denis & Michèle
lenders.loan_because: This is our way for helping other and make this world a better place, one person at the time.
lenders.occupational_info: Both of us were aircraft mechanic but now we are retired and enjoying the good life

lenders.name: greg
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance writer specializing in religion and an adjunct professor of ethics, Bible, and comparative religion. My wife is a hair stylist.

lenders.name: Veronique
lenders.loan_because:
Because I can so I should, and I love the stories!
I also love the KIVA staff, all dedicated and energetic!
lenders.occupational_info:
I help children with learning disabilities.
I translate for Kiva!

lenders.name: Michel
lenders.loan_because: it is my choice. I strongly believe in personal initiative and I want to support it wherever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a researcher, trying to describe the sea in such manners that engineers can build safer offshore structures and ships.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: I  want to.
lenders.occupational_info: Striving to make a difference, one person at a time.

lenders.name: Graham
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gift certificates make for fantastic presents.
lenders.occupational_info: I make DVDs and design print material for businesses.

lenders.name: In Memory of Vern Baker
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I feel everyone needs to have a chance to excel.  Pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Executive Assistant

lenders.name: franksplanet
lenders.loan_because: I want to reach out to my fellow residents of earth and let them know that we care for them and want them to have a better life for themselves, their family,  and their community.

lenders.name: William A.
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Professor of Law and of Philosophy, Georgia State University, Atlanta, Georgia USA

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: My impact grows every time I loan again and again and again..........

lenders.name: Leigh
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people an opportunity to better themselves. Handouts only support dependency.
lenders.occupational_info: I do \"the art of business\" -- websites, brochures, and all visual marketing.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I understand the impact that loaning has, building trust and enterprise with those who need it most.

lenders.name: Ken Oatman
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur too!  And I want to help other hard workers like myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Solar electric power installer.

lenders.name: joshua
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a computer artist making Cartoon movies.

lenders.name: JRHS Tigers
lenders.loan_because: My students and I collect soft drink cans worth $0.05/  and sometimes beer bottles $0.10 each.  We try to help the environment at the same time as send the small sums to those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: High School Science teacher

lenders.name: June Hayes
lenders.loan_because: I love what KIVA is doing, helping people help themselves and am honored to be part of this effort. Thanks to my son, David, for turning me on to KIVA! Namaste'

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to support entrepreneurs in other countries to become self sufficient, prosperous individuals. I truly believe that it does take a village to raise a child. And these dear people need our help.

lenders.name: Netsanet
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Self-Empowerment !!

lenders.name: McCartney
lenders.loan_because: I've been to rural africa and have seen what must be done.
lenders.occupational_info: We train people to use maps

lenders.name: MeltedSnow
lenders.loan_because: I have been so lucky in my life to be surrounded by so many great people.  I hope to give a peice of that good fortune to someone else so that they can have a better life as well.
lenders.occupational_info: We are nomads, conservationist, students, baristas, activists, lab rats, cyclists, artists, lovers, construction workers, and educators.

lenders.name: J,K, Aidan & Layton
lenders.loan_because: We loan to help those that are helping themselves.

lenders.name: Philip & Rachel
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping those who have the drive and ambition to help themselves.

lenders.name: Florentine
lenders.occupation: Him: Architecture Grad Student; Her: RN
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Sina
lenders.loan_because: i care.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.loan_because: It makes such an impact.
lenders.occupational_info: Enabling poor people earn a living, so they can feed, cloth and educate themselves.

lenders.name: Sunita
lenders.loan_because: it makes the most sense to me...the stories of the power of microloans are truly phenomenal and, to me, seem like the best way to put my money to use.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the urban school district in Chicago get better through providing money to promising programs and initiatives.

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I study drought and fire history.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer programs

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people who are already making an effort.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m in my last year of High-School (secondary school) and plan on attending university next year, hopefully studying Theatre and Performance Studies

lenders.name: RICHARD
lenders.loan_because: I would like to think I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help defendants addicted to controlled substances become sober, avoid prison, and have their criminal cases dismissed.

lenders.name: Robert Bruce
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do for those less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: retired international marketing exec

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't I? KIVA is an amazing organization. One person can and does make a difference and that person changes so much for so many. I'm fortunate to have this opportunity to share what is equally "ours".

lenders.name: Ms Allen
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can. Because I want to make a connection with others. Because I believe that change comes in small places by ordinary people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lenders.name: George and Patricia
lenders.loan_because: We can see we have the ability to make someones life better with very little effort on our part. We live in the richest nation on earth and we want to help people from some of the poorest.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife works for a group of  Doctors and I am a disabled business owner.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference - too often governments get in the way.  This seems very real and forward thinking to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Our health center gives medical care to people who cannot afford it.  Also, my wife and I run an organic farm.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: you can not take it with you

lenders.name: Family Law Group
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of attorneys, paralegals, legal assistants and a file clerk working in the family law department of a Seattle law firm.  From your friends:  Darla, Jake, Laura, Lisa, Llewelyn, Misty, Ray, Rebecca, Sarah, Colleen and Tia.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I have always been a humanitarian. I try my hardest to give back to the people of this world. I have lived in poverty for apart of my life, and at my family\'s lowest point people always helped out with whatever they could. That is what drives me to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in a University.

lenders.name: syler
lenders.loan_because: we all should
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze disputes and do legal research and writing.

lenders.name: jane
lenders.loan_because: It\'s Christmas and my sister and I thought it would be good to lend the money instead of buying Christmas presents.  So happy Christmas.
